hymn.title: Not what I am, O Lord, but what Thou art
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Love

layout.singingstanza: Not what I am, O Lord, but what Thou art; That, that a -- lone, can be my soul's true rest; Thy love, not mine, bids fear and doubt de -- part, And stills the tem -- pest of my toss -- ing breast.

lyrics.stanza: It is Thy perfect love that casts out fear; I know the voice that speaks the It is I, And in these well-known words of heavenly cheer I hear the joy that bids each sorrow fly.
Thy Name is Love! I hear it from yon Cross; Thy Name is Love! I read it in yon tomb: All meaner love is perishable dross, But this shall light me through time's thickest gloom.
